altTitles.en: Princess Blooms as a Crazy Flower
Princess Blooms Into a Crazy Flower

altTitles.pt: A princesa floresce como uma flor maluca

altTitles.es: La princesa florece como una flor loca

altTitles.ru: Дочь эрцгерцога, что расцвела в безумный цветок

altTitles.fa: پرنسس به عنوان گلی دیوانه شکوفه میکند

altTitles.th: เจ้าหญิงคลั่งแห่งวังหลวง

altTitles.vi: Công chúa của bông hoa điên điển

description.en:
An outcast from the imperial family due to her freewheeling attitude and refusal to get married, Princess Melody Corbella wants nothing more than to live life on her own terms and protect the people of the empire. Using her secret powers to sneak out of the palace to influence affairs from behind the scenes, she ends up drawing the attention of the handsome imperial guard, Caisar Bethel. Though she avoided romance until now, could love finally bloom for this crazy flower?

---
“I, Melody Corbella, wish to marry him!” The rest of the table reacted in a cold enough manner for the Princess to feel ashamed, having raised her right arm vigorously with sparkles in her eyes.

And then, Prince Deimos broke the silence to open his mouth, “We must not send a nutcase like her, Your Majesty!!”

It was finally the moment where all of her crazy deeds in the past came to fruition; because the only way she could escape being sent off for Royal Marriage was to throw away the image of a Princess that everyone expected.

She chose to cut her hair short and be reborn as the Crazy Flower in the Royal Palace.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80-%EB%AF%B8%EC%B9%9C-%EA%BD%83%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%94%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%82%98%EB%8B%A4/2994), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59603265)

description.fr:
Quand la princesse Mélodie Corbella déclare avec enthousiasme au cours d’une réunion d’état qu’elle souhaite faire un mariage princier, un vent glacial souffle sur l’assemblée. Seul le prince Deïmos réagit avec virulence et implore l’Empereur de ne surtout pas marier cette folle à qui que ce soit. Mélodie attendait cet instant depuis un an, un an à faire tout son possible pour quitter son image de princesse et à se faire passer pour une folle afin d’échapper à un mariage princier qu’elle refuse catégoriquement. Après s’être coupé les cheveux et avoir abandonné les robes pour des pantalons bien plus confortables, la princesse renaît en fleur sauvage.

---

description.id:
Melody Corbella dikenal sebagai 'putri gila' di Kerajaan Corbella. Tak hanya penampilannya, tingkah lakunya yang memicu keributan di istana pun tak mencerminkan seorang tuan putri. Namun, ternyata Melody menyimpan rencana tersembunyi di balik semua tingkah gilanya... Apa itu?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80-%EB%AF%B8%EC%B9%9C-%EA%BD%83%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%94%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%82%98%EB%8B%A4/2994), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59603265)

description.pt-br:
“Eu, Melody Corbella, quero me casar!”

A reação de todos com exceção da princesa é suficientemente fria, na medida que seu braço direito, levanta-se vigorosamente com olhos brilhantes, inquietos.

Nesse momento, o príncipe Deimos quebra o silêncio e abre sua boca.
“Não permita essa loucura, vossa majestade!”

Foi o momento em que a loucura do passado se tornou realidade. A única forma de evitar o matrimônio nacional era se afastar da aparência de princesa que todos queriam. Por isso, optou por cabelos curtos e calças. Assim, renasceu como uma flor do palácio imperial.

---

description.th:
เจ้าหญิงเมโลดี้ คอร์เบลลา ผู้มีลักษณะของชายหนุ่มมากกว่าหญิงสาว เธอตัดผมสั้นและสวมกางเกง ซึ่งแตกต่างจากภาพลักษณ์ของเจ้าหญิงที่ทุกคนปรารถนา เพราะต้องการจะหลีกเลี่ยงการแต่งงาน แล้วแผนการของเธอจะสำเร็จหรือไม่!?

---

description.tr:
Evliliğime engel olmak için 1 yıldır deli numarası yapıyorum.
“Majesteleri! Ulusun temsilcisi olarak gerçekten evlenmek istiyorum!!! Majesteleri! Gerçekten evlenmek istiyorum. Aizen İmparatorluğu olmasa bile Vladimir Krallığı’na gelin gidebilirim! Kralın yakında evleneceğini duydum! Lüks ve refah içinde yaşamak istiyorum!!”
“Majesteleri, bu deli prensesin söylediklerini duyuyor musunuz?!
“Majesteleri, bu deli prensesi oraya gönderirseniz bizi alay konusu yaparsınız!”
Huzur ve rahatlık içinde yaşamanın en iyi yolu buydu! Hatta imparatorluktaki en yakışıklı adam olduğu söylenen Cesar Bethel ile evlenmeyi bile planlıyordum. Ama… Garip bir şeyler var.
“Dövüş benimle”.
Hayır, böyle olmamalıydı.
Ek olarak, hiç vicdanı olmayan prens bile,
“Benimle gel, Melody”.
“Kendinizi düşünseniz bile bu çok saçma değil mi?”
Huzurlu ve rahat bir hayat yaşamak istiyordum… bunu nasıl başaracağım?!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80-%EB%AF%B8%EC%B9%9C-%EA%BD%83%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%94%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%82%98%EB%8B%A4/2994), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59603265)

description.zh:
靠一些发疯在皇宫求生存 美丽门面、联姻工具就是这里的公主存在的意义…… 哥哥们在暗流涌动勾心斗角的夺嫡，所谓公主不过只是他们巩固地位的踏脚石罢了。 不过哥哥们，疯子还有利用价值吗？ “快让开，那个疯子公主来了！” “哈哈哈哈哈哈！父皇~皇兄们~我找你们好久啦！”

---

description.zh-hk:
乖巧懂事、遵從禮俗的科貝拉帝國皇女梅樂蒂，某天卻突然剪去一頭長髮、改穿褲子，決心成為皇室裡一朵恣意綻放的狂花！這些離經叛道的舉動，其實早已計劃許久？而皇女身上，似乎還藏著阿維布一族銷聲匿跡的祕密……

---
